title: Get Exchange Rates
description: Retrieves the exchange rates from a base currency to all currencies supported by the system.

exchange_rates.description: Command code - always set to fixed value 1

base_currency.description: Base currency (can be obtained from payout_currencies call)

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
